metadata.name: Good Morning Mr. Blue
metadata.description:
Taken in Paddington, London, December, 2015

As my first print magazine feature and now my SuperRare genesis piece, this photo holds a lot of meaning for me.

My intention with this shot was to remove as many distractions as possible to create a minimalistic image, then wait patiently for someone to enter. Today, this process is still a hallmark of my street photography, using vibrant colours to change London's reputation as stale and grey, attempting to create a sense of beauty and calmness of my home city and its inhabitants.
